div.p: F74/8854, unit 742, VPRS 3991/P inward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.
These are the books, dear Mr. Ware, which through your office are to be sent to America in return for others received from the Department of exterior there.
